TopicTitle: Inactive aircraft does not work Lazor(romfarer) AutoPilot

Articles.Content:
I need lift off 2 plane, but an inactive aircraft does not work Lazor(romfarer) AutoPilot. However MechJeb worked on inactive aircraft, but its work is unsatisfactory.

Is there a way to create the effect of activity?

PS: Sorry if not correct section forum.
Burn Together is the closest thing to handling this of which I'm aware. Other than that...yeah, that's just how KSP works.

Burn Together is the closest thing to handling this of which I'm aware. Other than that...yeah, that's just how KSP works.

Thanks you, but it is not the. Only one plane must lie on the course.
Yep, that is indeed how aerial refueling works. That said, I don't know of a solution for you; that was the closest thing I could think of.
